items.title: Nikkei 225 breaks 50,000 for first time ever
items.standfirst: Japan’s Nikkei 225 stock index broke 50,000 for the first time ever on Monday, after a mix of recording-setting days and choppy trading over the past few weeks. The rally came as the United States and China reached a temporary framework trade agreement Sunday in Kuala Lumpur. U.S. President Donald…

items.title: Treasury Secretary says U.S. and China agree to a trade deal 'framework'
items.standfirst: President Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping are expected to reach a deal to avert a new 100% U.S. tariff on Chinese goods, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said following talks with Beijing’s top trade negotiator. NBC News’ Gabe Gutierrez is traveling with the president in Malaysia.
items.content: President Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping are expected to reach a deal to avert a new 100% U.S. tariff on Chinese goods, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said following talks with Beijing’s top trade negotiator. NBC News’ Gabe Gutierrez is traveling with the president in Malaysia.

items.standfirst: US treasury secretary anticipates tariff truce with China will be extended, and that China will revive substantial purchases of US soybeansThe US and China have agreed a framework for a trade deal just days before Donald Trump and Chines president Xi Jinping are due to meet.Treasury secretary Scott Bessent said the agreement, forged on the sidelines of the Association of south-east Asian Nations (Asean) summit in Malaysia on Sunday, would remove the threat of the imposition of 100% tariffs on Chinese imports starting on 1 November and include “a final deal” on the sale of TikTok in the US. Continue reading...

items.title: Bessent says additional 100% tariffs on China are "effectively off the table"

items.title: US and China reach ‘final deal’ on TikTok sale, treasury secretary says
items.standfirst: Scott Bessent said plan was part of framework for trade deal but did not share details on transferring app’s ownershipMurdoch, Ellison and China: what we know about the US’s TikTok dealUS treasury secretary Scott Bessent claimed on Sunday that the US and China have finalized the details of a deal transferring TikTok’s US version to new owners.“We reached a final deal on TikTok,” Bessent said on Sunday on CBS’s Face the Nation with Margaret Brennan. Alluding to Donald Trump and his Chinese counterpart, Xi Jinping, Bessent continued: “We reached [a deal] in Madrid, and I believe that as of today, all the details are ironed out, and that will be for the two leaders to consummate that transaction” during a meeting scheduled for Thursday in Korea. Continue reading...
items.content: Scott Bessent said plan was part of framework for trade deal but did not share details on transferring app’s ownershipMurdoch, Ellison and China: what we know about the US’s TikTok dealUS treasury secretary Scott Bessent claimed on Sunday that the US and China have finalized the details of a deal transferring TikTok’s US version to new owners.“We reached a final deal on TikTok,” Bessent said on Sunday on CBS’s Face the Nation with Margaret Brennan. Alluding to Donald Trump and his Chinese counterpart, Xi Jinping, Bessent continued: “We reached [a deal] in Madrid, and I believe that as of today, all the details are ironed out, and that will be for the two leaders to consummate that transaction” during a meeting scheduled for Thursday in Korea. Continue reading...

items.title: TikTok deal to be finalized Thursday, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent says

items.title: Trump kicks off Asia tour with Xi meeting on the agenda
items.standfirst: US President Donald Trump started his Asia tour in Malaysia Sunday by rewarding Cambodia and Thailand with trade deals after co-signing their ceasefire pact, and saying he was confident of a "great" trade deal at upcoming talks with China's Xi Jinping. Trump brimmed with confidence ahead of the meeting with Xi in South Korea, that seeks to end the bruising trade war between the world's two biggest economies.
items.content: US President Donald Trump started his Asia tour in Malaysia Sunday by rewarding Cambodia and Thailand with trade deals after co-signing their ceasefire pact, and saying he was confident of a "great" trade deal at upcoming talks with China's Xi Jinping. Trump brimmed with confidence ahead of the meeting with Xi in South Korea, that seeks to end the bruising trade war between the world's two biggest economies.

items.title: US and China say trade deal drawing closer as Trump and Xi prepare for meeting
items.standfirst: China's top trade negotiator, Li Chenggang, told reporters the two had reached a "preliminary consensus," while Trump's treasury secretary, Scott Bessent, said there was "a very successful framework."
items.content: China's top trade negotiator, Li Chenggang, told reporters the two had reached a "preliminary consensus," while Trump's treasury secretary, Scott Bessent, said there was "a very successful framework."(Image credit: Vincent Thian/)

items.title: US and China agree on trade framework for rare earths, soybeans
items.standfirst: US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Sunday signalled that Washington and Beijing had reached a tentative trade framework that would see China delaying export curbs on rare earths and buying more US soybeans. If confirmed, the agreement would avert a threatened 100 percent hike on tariffs on Chinese exports.
items.content: US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Sunday signalled that Washington and Beijing had reached a tentative trade framework that would see China delaying export curbs on rare earths and buying more US soybeans. If confirmed, the agreement would avert a threatened 100 percent hike on tariffs on Chinese exports.

items.title: Trump oversees Thailand-Cambodia ceasefire signing as Asia tour gets under way
items.standfirst: Trump has begun a five-day trip to Malaysia, Japan and South Korea, his first visit to the region since taking office in JanuaryDonald Trump has overseen the signing of a ceasefire agreement between Thailand and Cambodia on the first day of an Asia tour where he will seal new trade agreements and hold a crucial meeting with Xi Jinping.The US president arrived in Malaysia on Sunday before the Asean summit in the capital, Kuala Lumpur. At a ceasefire ceremony in front of a sign that read “Delivering Peace”, the Thai prime minister, Anutin Charnvirakul, and his Cambodian counterpart, Hun Manet, signed an expanded ceasefire deal related to a deadly five-day conflict in July. Continue reading...
items.content: Trump has begun a five-day trip to Malaysia, Japan and South Korea, his first visit to the region since taking office in JanuaryDonald Trump has overseen the signing of a ceasefire agreement between Thailand and Cambodia on the first day of an Asia tour where he will seal new trade agreements and hold a crucial meeting with Xi Jinping.The US president arrived in Malaysia on Sunday before the Asean summit in the capital, Kuala Lumpur. At a ceasefire ceremony in front of a sign that read “Delivering Peace”, the Thai prime minister, Anutin Charnvirakul, and his Cambodian counterpart, Hun Manet, signed an expanded ceasefire deal related to a deadly five-day conflict in July. Continue reading...

items.title: Trump says he's ended eight wars in eight months

items.title: Trump arrives in Asia with trade — and tensions with Xi — on the agenda
items.standfirst: President Donald Trump arrived in Southeast Asia on Sunday for his first visit to the continent since returning to office, a three-nation tour through Malaysia, Japan and South Korea that is expected to culminate in a meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping, as tensions between the world’s two biggest economies tick higher.
items.content: President Donald Trump arrived in Southeast Asia on Sunday for his first visit to the continent since returning to office, a three-nation tour through Malaysia, Japan and South Korea that is expected to culminate in a meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping, as tensions between the world’s two biggest economies tick higher.

items.title: Trump says he is open to meeting Kim Jong-un as he embarks on whirlwind Asia tour
items.standfirst: Trip will see him take part in high-stakes trade talks with Chinese leader Xi Jinping – but he also raised prospect of meeting North Korean leaderTrump in Asia: five key questions as US president prepares for diplomatic tourDonald Trump has set off for a tour of Asia where he is expected to take part in high-stakes trade talks with China’s leader, Xi Jinping – telling reporters he was also open to a meeting with the North Korean leader, Kim Jong-un.Trump, who left Washington on Friday night, is set for a five-day trip to Malaysia, Japan and South Korea, his first visit to the region since taking office in January. He is due to arrive in Malaysia on Sunday morning local time. Continue reading...
items.content: Trip will see him take part in high-stakes trade talks with Chinese leader Xi Jinping – but he also raised prospect of meeting North Korean leaderTrump in Asia: five key questions as US president prepares for diplomatic tourDonald Trump has set off for a tour of Asia where he is expected to take part in high-stakes trade talks with China’s leader, Xi Jinping – telling reporters he was also open to a meeting with the North Korean leader, Kim Jong-un.Trump, who left Washington on Friday night, is set for a five-day trip to Malaysia, Japan and South Korea, his first visit to the region since taking office in January. He is due to arrive in Malaysia on Sunday morning local time. Continue reading...

clusters.title: Arrests made in crown jewelry heist at Paris' Louvre museum, prosecutor says
clusters.neutral_headline: Arrests Made in Louvre Museum Crown Jewel Heist Investigation
bullet_summary: Suspects have been arrested in connection with the theft of crown jewels from Paris’ Louvre museum, the Paris prosecutor said on Sunday, a week after the heist that stunned the world
The prosecutor said that investigators made the arrests on Saturday evening, adding that one of the men taken into custody was preparing to leave the country from Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport
The Paris prosecutor said on Sunday that a number of suspects have been arrested over the theft of crown jewels from the Louvre museum in Paris last weekend
French police have made arrests in connection with the heist of France’s crown jewels from the Louvre Museum in Paris, officials said Sunday

items.title: Arrests made in crown jewelry heist at Paris' Louvre museum, prosecutor says
items.standfirst: Thieves took less than eight minutes to steal jewels valued at $102 million last Sunday morning from Paris' famous Louvre museum.
items.content: Thieves took less than eight minutes to steal jewels valued at $102 million last Sunday morning from Paris' famous Louvre museum.

items.title: Details on arrests in Louvre crown jewel heist
items.standfirst: Several suspects are in custody one week after France's crown jewels were stolen from the famed Louvre Museum, police in Paris say. Leigh Kiniry reports.
items.content: Several suspects are in custody one week after France's crown jewels were stolen from the famed Louvre Museum, police in Paris say. Leigh Kiniry reports.

items.title: French police arrest suspects linked to Louvre jewellery heist
items.standfirst: Suspects have been arrested in connection with the theft of crown jewels from Paris’ Louvre museum, the Paris prosecutor said on Sunday, a week after the heist that stunned the world. The prosecutor said that investigators made the arrests on Saturday evening, adding that one of the men taken into custody was preparing to leave the country from Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport.
items.content: Suspects have been arrested in connection with the theft of crown jewels from Paris’ Louvre museum, the Paris prosecutor said on Sunday, a week after the heist that stunned the world. The prosecutor said that investigators made the arrests on Saturday evening, adding that one of the men taken into custody was preparing to leave the country from Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport.

items.title: French police arrest two men over €88m Louvre jewel heist
items.standfirst: One man arrested at Charles de Gaulle airport and another just outside Paris, officials confirm French police have arrested two suspects believed to have helped steal crown jewels worth an estimated €88m (£76m) from the Louvre museum in Paris, officials have said, a week after one of the country’s most spectacular heists in decades.The Paris public prosecutor confirmed media reports on Sunday that one man had been detained at about 10pm local time on Saturday at the capital’s Charles de Gaulle airport by officers from the armed robberies and serious burglaries squad. Continue reading...
items.content: One man arrested at Charles de Gaulle airport and another just outside Paris, officials confirm French police have arrested two suspects believed to have helped steal crown jewels worth an estimated €88m (£76m) from the Louvre museum in Paris, officials have said, a week after one of the country’s most spectacular heists in decades.The Paris public prosecutor confirmed media reports on Sunday that one man had been detained at about 10pm local time on Saturday at the capital’s Charles de Gaulle airport by officers from the armed robberies and serious burglaries squad. Continue reading...

items.title: Two arrested over theft of jewels at Louvre museum in Paris
items.standfirst: Four thieves broke into the world's most-visited museum in broad daylight, stealing eight items worth €88m (£76m; $102m).
items.content: Four thieves broke into the world's most-visited museum in broad daylight, stealing eight items worth €88m (£76m; $102m).

items.title: Louvre heist suspects reportedly arrested in northern Paris suburb
items.standfirst: Two suspects have been arrested in connection with the theft of crown jewels from Paris’ Louvre Museum, the Paris prosecutor said on Sunday, a week after the heist at the world’s most visited museum that stunned the world. Citing local media, FRANCE 24’s Ellen Gainsford reported that the arrests took place in Saint-Denis, a northern suburb of Paris, and that one of the men was attempting to travel to Algeria from Charles de Gaulle Airport.
items.content: Two suspects have been arrested in connection with the theft of crown jewels from Paris’ Louvre Museum, the Paris prosecutor said on Sunday, a week after the heist at the world’s most visited museum that stunned the world. Citing local media, FRANCE 24’s Ellen Gainsford reported that the arrests took place in Saint-Denis, a northern suburb of Paris, and that one of the men was attempting to travel to Algeria from Charles de Gaulle Airport.

items.content: One of the alleged burglars was trying to leave the country from Charles de Gaulle airport

clusters.title: Argentina’s Milei secures big victory in midterm elections
clusters.neutral_headline: Argentina's Milei Wins Midterm Elections, Secures Reforms
bullet_summary: Reported by Financial Times, Guardian World, Reuters Top News and others

items.title: Argentina’s Milei secures big victory in midterm elections
items.standfirst: Free-market president wins endorsement for reforms after weeks of financial market turmoil
items.content: Free-market president wins endorsement for reforms after weeks of financial market turmoil

items.title: Javier Milei hails ‘tipping point’ as his far-right party wins Argentina’s midterm elections
items.standfirst: The result falls short of giving Milei a congressional majority but has been widely described as surprising by Argentinian analystsThe party of Argentina’s far-right president, Javier Milei, has won Sunday’s midterm elections after a campaign in which US president Donald Trump announced a $40bn bailout for the country and made continued aid conditional on the victory of his Argentinian counterpart.With more than 95% of ballots counted, Milei’s party, La Libertad Avanza, won 40.84% of the nationwide vote in an election widely seen as a de facto referendum on the self-styled anarcho-capitalist’s nearly two years in power. Continue reading...
items.content: The result falls short of giving Milei a congressional majority but has been widely described as surprising by Argentinian analystsThe party of Argentina’s far-right president, Javier Milei, has won Sunday’s midterm elections after a campaign in which US president Donald Trump announced a $40bn bailout for the country and made continued aid conditional on the victory of his Argentinian counterpart.With more than 95% of ballots counted, Milei’s party, La Libertad Avanza, won 40.84% of the nationwide vote in an election widely seen as a de facto referendum on the self-styled anarcho-capitalist’s nearly two years in power. Continue reading...

items.content: La Libertad Avanza wins most votes nationally and in the Buenos Aires province, early results and media tallies show.

items.title: Milei's party wins Argentina's midterm elections
items.standfirst: More to come......

items.title: US-backed Milei scores surprise midterm win, revives Argentina reform drive
items.standfirst: Argentina’s libertarian President Javier Milei scored a surprise victory in Sunday’s midterm elections, bolstering his embattled reform drive. His La Libertad Avanza party won 40.84% of votes for Congress, with 90% counted, marking a rebound for the US-backed right-winger after months of economic turmoil and political resistance.
items.content: Argentina’s libertarian President Javier Milei scored a surprise victory in Sunday’s midterm elections, bolstering his embattled reform drive. His La Libertad Avanza party won 40.84% of votes for Congress, with 90% counted, marking a rebound for the US-backed right-winger after months of economic turmoil and political resistance.

items.title: Embattled Milei faces critical midterm elections in Argentina
items.standfirst: The outcome of the elections could determine the future of Milei's economic programme and a vital $40bn US bailout.
items.content: The outcome of the elections could determine the future of Milei's economic programme and a vital $40bn US bailout.

items.title: Argentina goes to polls amid economic crisis and Trump ‘interference’
items.standfirst: Poor showing in Sunday’s election would deal hammer blow to country’s radical libertarian president, Javier MileiArgentina’s radical libertarian leader, Javier Milei, is facing a pivotal moment in his presidency with voters set to deliver their verdict on his two-year-old administration on Sunday against a backdrop of political and economic crisis and accusations that his ally Donald Trump is meddling in the country’s affairs.A poor showing in Sunday’s midterm election would be a hammer blow to Milei, who took power in December 2023 pledging to kickstart “a new era of peace and prosperity” by slashing spending and inflation. Continue reading...
items.content: Poor showing in Sunday’s election would deal hammer blow to country’s radical libertarian president, Javier MileiArgentina’s radical libertarian leader, Javier Milei, is facing a pivotal moment in his presidency with voters set to deliver their verdict on his two-year-old administration on Sunday against a backdrop of political and economic crisis and accusations that his ally Donald Trump is meddling in the country’s affairs.A poor showing in Sunday’s midterm election would be a hammer blow to Milei, who took power in December 2023 pledging to kickstart “a new era of peace and prosperity” by slashing spending and inflation. Continue reading...

ai_summary: Javier Milei's party won Argentina's midterm elections.
Milei's party won the most votes nationally and in Buenos Aires.
The election was seen as a referendum on Milei's time in power.
Milei's party won 40.84% of the vote for Congress.
Investor reaction followed Milei's victory in the congressional vote.

items.title: One killed and six injured after shooting at Pennsylvania’s Lincoln University
items.standfirst: One armed person detained as historically Black school shooting comes amid rising violence at homecoming eventsAt least one person was killed and six others wounded in a shooting at Lincoln University in Pennsylvania late on Saturday, as students and alumni celebrated homecoming at outdoor festivities at the historically Black university, authorities said.A person who had a firearm was detained, and officials are investigating the possibility that there was more than one shooter but don’t believe there is any active threat to the campus, Chester county’s district attorney, Christopher de Barrena-Sarobe, said during a brief news conference early on Sunday. Continue reading...

items.content: Move is response to ad sponsored by Ontario that referenced Ronald Reagan’s support for free tradeDonald Trump announced on Saturday that he will raise US tariffs on Canada by 10% in retaliation for an anti-tariff advertisement sponsored by the Ontario government, which has further strained one of the world’s largest trade partnerships.The statement, posted on the US president’s Truth Social account, came after several days of public disputes over the ad, which referenced Ronald Reagan’s support for free trade and provoked the US president’s anger. Continue reading...

ai_summary: The US president announced a 10% tariff increase on Canadian goods.
The move is in retaliation for an anti-tariff advertisement.
The advertisement was sponsored by the Ontario government.
The ad referenced Ronald Reagan's support for free trade.
This action further strains the US and Canadian trade partnership.

clusters.title: Russia says it has tested nuclear-powered Burevestnik missile

bullet_summary: Russia has tested a new nuclear-powered cruise missile with an unlimited range, the country's top general said
Reported by BBC World, Sky News World

items.title: Russia says it has tested nuclear-powered Burevestnik missile
items.standfirst: The experimental weapon is hailed as having a potentially unlimited range - though Western experts have questioned its value.
items.content: The experimental weapon is hailed as having a potentially unlimited range - though Western experts have questioned its value.

items.content: Russia has tested a new nuclear-powered cruise missile with an unlimited range, the country's top general said.

The missile is said to have a potentially unlimited range.
Western experts have questioned the missile's value.
The test was announced by Russia's top general.
The Burevestnik is a nuclear-powered cruise missile.

clusters.title: Left-winger Catherine Connolly wins Irish presidency
clusters.neutral_headline: Catherine Connolly Wins Irish Presidential Election
bullet_summary: Connolly, 68, said Saturday evening at Dublin Castle that she would champion diversity and be a voice for peace and one that “builds on our policy of neutrality
Reported by France24, BBC World

items.title: Left-winger Catherine Connolly wins Irish presidency
items.standfirst: Left-wing independent Catherine Connolly, who secured the backing of Ireland's left-leaning parties including Sinn Féin, has won the country's presidential election in a landslide victory against her centre-right rival. Connolly, 68, said Saturday evening at Dublin Castle that she would champion diversity and be a voice for peace and one that “builds on our policy of neutrality.”
items.content: Left-wing independent Catherine Connolly, who secured the backing of Ireland's left-leaning parties including Sinn Féin, has won the country's presidential election in a landslide victory against her centre-right rival. Connolly, 68, said Saturday evening at Dublin Castle that she would champion diversity and be a voice for peace and one that “builds on our policy of neutrality.”

items.title: Connolly declared president of Ireland after landslide win
items.standfirst: Catherine Connolly, an independent who was backed by the major left-wing parties, pledges to be "an inclusive president for all".
items.content: Catherine Connolly, an independent who was backed by the major left-wing parties, pledges to be "an inclusive president for all".

ai_summary: Catherine Connolly won the Irish presidential election.
Connolly is an independent candidate backed by left-wing parties.
She pledged to be an inclusive president for all citizens.
Connolly secured a landslide victory against her rival.
She will champion diversity and advocate for peace.
